inclusion.criterion: Treatment will be given through 34 weeks 6 days gestation or delivery.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Gestational age between 16 weeks 0 days to 20 weeks 6 days based on clinical information and evaluation of the first ultrasound.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Signed patient authorization and consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior elective fetal reduction in the current pregnancy, except in the case of a quadruplet gestation reduced to triplets.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planned fetal reduction or planned termination
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Fetal death or imminent fetal demise
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major fetal anomaly (e.g., gastroschisis, spina bifida, serious karyotypic abnormalities). An ultrasound examination from 12 weeks 0 days to 20 weeks 6 days by project estimated date of confinement (EDC) must be performed to rule out fetal anomalies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Discordance in fetal size, defined as a discrepancy of 3 or more weeks in gestational age by ultrasound between the largest and the smallest fetus. Diagnosis is based on measurements made at the ultrasound done between 12 weeks 0 days and 20 weeks 6 days gestation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Progesterone treatment used or planned after 14 weeks gestation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
